Package utils.formatter

package utils.formatter
Formatting utilities for display and presentation.

This package provides formatters for converting domain objects into display-ready strings:

  • Formatter - Base interface for formatters
  • ApplicationFormatter - Format application data for tables
  • InternshipFormatter - Format internship data for tables
  • UserFormatter - Format user profiles
  • TableFormatter - Generic table layout and column width calculation
  • FilterFormatter - Format filter settings display
  • ViewFormatter - Common view formatting (headers, borders, text centering)

Design pattern: Strategy pattern for flexible formatting algorithms.

Features:

  • Consistent table formatting with fixed column widths
  • Pagination support
  • MVC compliance through reflection-based formatting
  • Reusable UI components (headers, borders, centered text)
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group
